title: Meditation: Aliveness and Presence (2021-03-03)
itunes:title: Meditation: Aliveness and Presence
description: Meditation: Aliveness and Presence (2021-03-03) - This meditation guides us to wake up our senses and full aliveness through a body scan, and then to rest in the formless presence that is aware of this changing dance of life.  We close with a poem by Robert Hall.
